date: '`r format(Sys.time(), "%d %B, %Y")`'

output:
  bookdown::bs4_book:
    repo: https://github.com/jungheejung/cue_expectancy

        google:

      heading_font:

  bookdown::gitbook:

      toc:
        collapse: section
        scroll_highlight: true
        before: null
        after: null

      edit : null

        engine: lunr
        options: null

        theme: white
        family: sans
        size: 2
      info: true
    css: style.css
    code_folding: hide
    includes:
      in_header: null
bibliography:
  - book.bib
  - packages.bib

link-citations: yes

  markdown: 
    wrap: 72
